name: yuki/files
description: YukiFiles - Modern file upload and sharing with auth, quotas, anti-clone, PayPal & crypto

post-install-cmd: @php -r 'is_dir("storage") || mkdir("storage"); is_dir("storage/files") || mkdir("storage/files", 0777, true); is_dir("storage/logs") || mkdir("storage/logs", 0777, true); is_dir("storage/sessions") || mkdir("storage/sessions", 0777, true); is_dir("storage/cache") || mkdir("storage/cache", 0777, true);'
